author: craigmcc
msg: When processing a form-based login redirect to the login page, save the
request parameters from the original request, and restore them after a
successful authentication, in line with current discussions on the Servlet 2.3
expert group.  This means that, even if the request that triggered form based
login was a POST, that the originally request will still be reproduced in a
